dict.acceptation: 能够的；有能力的；有才干的；干练的；

sent.orig: The ABLE method can be used to compute eigentriplets of large scale non-Hermitian matrices.
sent.trans: ABLE方法可以用于同时求解大规模非对称矩阵的特征值及其相应的左、右特征向量。

sent.orig: You can read more about Able Software Corp. by viewing the Able Software Company Profile.
sent.trans: 信息能软件您可以阅读更多有关能软件公司通过查看能软件公司简介。

sent.orig: The Lord replied,"Not only will she be able to think,she will be able to reason,and negotiate."
sent.trans: 上帝回答：“她不仅能思考，还能够推理，能够与人协商。”

sent.orig: Behind every able man, there are always other able men.
Average Number of Able bodied and Semi able bodied Laborers per Household (person)
